languages.text: "Ты обещал{mf||а} отдать мне эльдарку, как только мы выберемся из проклятого гнездовья ксеносов. Время пришло".
"You promised to give me the Aeldari as soon as we escaped that accursed nest of xenos. It is time."
languages.original_text: "Ты обещал{mf||а} отдать мне эльдарку, как только мы выберемся из проклятого гнездовья ксеносов. Время пришло".

traits.locale_text: "You have promised to give me the Aeldari as soon as we would get out of the accursed xenos' nest. It is time."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You have promised to give me the Aeldari as soon as we would get out of the accursed xenos' nest. It is time."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You promised to give me the Aeldari as soon as we escaped that accursed nest of xenos. It is time."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You promised to give me the Aeldari as soon as we escaped that accursed nest of xenos. It is time."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You promised to give me the Aeldari as soon as we escaped that accursed nest of xenos. It is time."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “你曾答应过我，一逃出那座诅咒的异形巢穴，就把这个艾达灵族交给我。是时候兑现你的承诺了。”
languages.original_text: "You promised to give me the Aeldari as soon as we escaped that accursed nest of xenos. It is time."

traits.locale_text: “你曾答应过我，一逃出那座诅咒的异形巢穴，就把这个艾达灵族交给我。是时候兑现你的承诺了。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Prometió que me entregaría a la Aeldari en cuanto escapásemos de ese maldito nido de xenos. Es la hora».
languages.original_text: "You promised to give me the Aeldari as soon as we escaped that accursed nest of xenos. It is time."

traits.locale_text: «Prometió que me entregaría a la Aeldari en cuanto escapásemos de ese maldito nido de xenos. Es la hora».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Vous avez promis de me livrer l'Aeldari dès que nous aurions réussi à nous échapper de ce maudit nid de xénos. L'heure est venue. »
languages.original_text: "You promised to give me the Aeldari as soon as we escaped that accursed nest of xenos. It is time."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez promis de me livrer l'Aeldari dès que nous aurions réussi à nous échapper de ce maudit nid de xénos. L'heure est venue. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr habt versprochen, mir die Aeldari zu übergeben, sobald wir aus diesem verfluchten Xenos-Nest entkommen sind. Es ist so weit."
languages.original_text: "You promised to give me the Aeldari as soon as we escaped that accursed nest of xenos. It is time."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt versprochen, mir die Aeldari zu übergeben, sobald wir aus diesem verfluchten Xenos-Nest entkommen sind. Es ist so weit."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「異種族の巣窟から脱出したら、すぐにアエルダリを渡すと約束されたはずですよ。今こそ、その時です」
languages.original_text: "You promised to give me the Aeldari as soon as we escaped that accursed nest of xenos. It is time."

traits.locale_text: 「異種族の巣窟から脱出したら、すぐにアエルダリを渡すと約束されたはずですよ。今こそ、その時です」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "O uğursuz zeno yuvasından kaçtığımız anda Aeldarileri bana teslim edeceğine söz vermiştin. Zamanı geldi."
languages.original_text: "You promised to give me the Aeldari as soon as we escaped that accursed nest of xenos. It is time."

traits.locale_text: "O uğursuz zeno yuvasından kaçtığımız anda Aeldari'yi bana teslim edeceğine söz vermiştin. Zamanı geldi."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
